import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export const settingSlice=createSlice({name:'settings',initialState:{settings:{},pages:{}},reducers:{readPagesSettings:(state,action)=>{state.pages=action.payload;}}});// Action creators are generated for each case reducer function
export const{readPagesSettings}=settingSlice.actions;export default settingSlice.reducer;
